Meaning-jp: ヒュムノス・クロニクルキー
ヒュムノス・デスペディア
ヒュムノス・ハイバーネション
ヒュムノス・ハーモニウス
ヒュムノスイムプランタ, 神の大樹, 実
Meaning-en: Implanta (a hymn); God's Tree in the myths of Metafalss, fruit, seed
Rhaplanca's partner in the myths of Metafalss.

Meaning-jp: ヒュムノス・メタファリカ
Meaning-en: Metafalica (a hymn), Song of Hope (to Mir), Song of Creation, Utopia

Meaning-jp: ヒュムノス・パージャ
ヒュムノス・ファンタスマゴリア
ヒュムノス・リネイション
ヒュムノス・レプレキア

Meaning-en: a goddess from Meta Falss' mythology, and Maoh's partner

Meaning-jp: ヒュムノス・リグヴェーダ
トランス状態 (自分の気が正気か否かもわからないくらいトランス状態の時に使う。もっとも、これを使うときは、これ以外の想音を使おうと思えるほど冷静ではないので、自然とこれが口から出てくる。)
Meaning-en: trance state (Note: Used only for a trance state in which the emotions of the singer aren't really expressed. Naturally, when this emotion sound is used, it doesn't show the same calm and composure of the other emotion sounds, and it flows by itself from the mouth of the singer)

Meaning-jp: ヒュムノス・ソルフェージ
ヒュムノス・スフィリャ
ヒュムノス・サブリメーション
ヒュムノス・サスペンド
きっと、確かに (高い可能性を示す語句)
Meaning-en: surely, certainly (Note: Used for expressing something that's highly probable to happen)

Meaning-jp: ～を (後ろに来るアルファベットが子音か母音か等、状況によって、最後の発音が変化します。 後ろの単語とつなげて発音した時、より音がきれいに流れる発音を選択してください。)
Meaning-en: (direct object marker) (Note: The pronunciation changes depending on if the last letter of the preceeding word was a vowel or consonant. The pronunciation used ("anwa" or "anu") depends on which one the speaker thinks that flows and sounds better with the rest of the phrase)

Meaning-jp: 開く、開放する、開示する、明かす
永遠, 永遠に、ずっと続く
Meaning-en: eternity, for the eternity, continues forever

Meaning-jp: 暗い、暗黒の、見えない, 闇
Meaning-en: dark, of darkness, unable to be seen

Meaning-jp: 夕刻 夕方 黄昏れ

Meaning-en: voices of delight, voices of joy

Meaning-jp: 友・友人・同士・同胞
鮮やかな、新鮮な、美しい、綺麗な
変化する、変える、変更する (chsより強烈であり、強制力の強いもの。既に「願い」ではなく「使役」。正教語であり一般人は使えない。「na」と合わせることで、「逆言」的な効果を持って強固な意志を表現する。)
Meaning-en: change, transform (Note: Has stronger connotations than "chs". This one doesn't mean the "wish" to change, but rather actually changing. It's an orthodox word not used by normal people. If it's preceeded by "na", then it takes the opposite meaning: indicating extreme firmness and determination)

Meaning-jp: 真実の、真の、本当の、真実
Meaning-en: of the true, true, real, truth

Meaning-jp: キスする、口づけする、キス
～になる (自分自身の形が完全に変わってしまうとき、もしくはモノの例えとして使う場合はこちら。何かと使われることが多い。)
Meaning-en: become (Note: Used metaphorically for whenever one wishes to change completely. It has an enormous variety of uses)

Meaning-jp: ～に変化する (自分や対象物に何かがプラスされる、一部変化する、何かが減るといった、部分的な物理変化を意味する。)
Meaning-en: transform into ~ (Note: Indicates increase, partial change or reductions on oneself or in the target. In short, it's used to express partial physical change).

Meaning-jp: 透明な 透き通った
狂気、気が触れた、狂った

Meaning-en: handed down, passed down, passed on

Meaning-jp: 裁かれる、裁きをうける、断罪される
しかし、でも、けれど、～だが (反対の接続語)
Meaning-en: however, but, still, and yet (Note: Connective for opposite sentences)
destroy, obliterate, bring to an end

Meaning-jp: 虜囚、虜、捕らわれ人 (囚われの、という形容詞としても使用可)
神の息吹 神の加護 (詩魔法の効能は防御とステータス上昇)
Meaning-en: God's breath, God's divine protection (Song Magic effects is defense and status increases)

Meaning-jp: 偽る・偽装する・騙す・偽り (動詞・名詞同形で使用可)

Meaning-en: divine, sacred, precious, valuable, sublime, solemn, noble

Meaning-jp: 聖なる剣、(転じて)偉大なる叡智

Meaning-en: (instrument/location/cause/time marker) (Note: Used to indicate means. Equivalent to the English "by").

Meaning-jp: ダウンロード、取り込む
日（英語のDay） (『一日』や『その日』など時間や期間を表す為に用いる。『何日目』の場合はdyyalを参照)
Meaning-en: day (Note: Used only for phrases such as "one day" or "that day". For phrases with aa definite number of days, "dyyal" is used instead)

Meaning-jp: 互いに (愛し合う→hartes eazasのように、動詞の後に付けて使う)
Meaning-en: mutually (Note: It can be attached to the end of a verb, like this: "hartes eazas" -> "mutual love")

Meaning-jp: ～から、～よりの、～より (fromに近い意味を持つ単語)
Meaning-en: from, out of (Note: It's similar in meaning and use to the English "from")

Meaning-jp: そして、～だから、～ために (英語のandです)
Meaning-en: and, because, for (Note: Direct equivalent to the English "and")

Meaning-jp: 永遠にこのままでいたい
Meaning-en: I want this to last eternally

Meaning-jp: 進む (主に普通に進む場合はこちら。集団で移動する場合はZahha)
Meaning-en: advance, make progress (Note: It's used for indicating the advancing of an individual or small groups. For the advancing of large groups, "Zahha" it's used instead).

Meaning-jp: さもなくば・そうしなければ～でしょう

Meaning-en: bird (Note: not used for small birds)

Meaning-jp: 明日 (未来の意味でも使用可)
ひっくり返る、フリップフロップ転送コマンド
覆う、満たす、埋める (覆うような、など、量や規模を表す形容詞としても同形で使用可)
Meaning-en: fill up, cover, hide (Note: It can also be used as an adjective to indicate the amount and scope of something)

Meaning-jp: そよ風 (Eをつけると意訳で「ささやき」)
Meaning-en: breeze (when it has an "E" emotion vowel in front, its meaning changes to "whisper").

Meaning-jp: 翼, 進める, 運ぶ
羽、羽毛、ひとひら (fwalは翼、fwillraは羽や羽毛のひとひら)
Meaning-en: feather, plumage, petal (Note: contrary to "fwal", which means "wings", "fwirlla" only refers to the feathers and plumage)
I want this to end soon

Meaning-jp: 自分はどうなってもいい
固い、頑なな、堅牢な、石、岩 (物質・精神両方の意味で「カタイ」ものの表現に使用可。名詞としては石や岩も指す。
Meaning-en: strong, stubborn, solid, stone, rock (Note: It's normally used to indicate the hardness of a material or the stubbornness of a mind. As a noun, it means "rock" and "stone")

Meaning-jp: 二度と先の状態に戻りたくない
Meaning-en: I never want to go back to how I was before

Meaning-jp: 鋼鉄の、鉄 (形容詞・名詞同形で使用可)
Meaning-en: steel, iron (Note: It can be used both as an adjective and a noun)

Meaning-jp: 神々しい、偉大な (LYAをつけると意訳で「神」)
Meaning-en: divine, exalted (Note: adding "LYA" before it changes its meaning to "God").
only ~ (it's used in the same way as the English "only")

Meaning-jp: 心に勇気を抱く 護りたいと想う

Meaning-en: mountain recesses, interior (of a building, etc.)

Meaning-jp: 緑 緑色の 碧 (名詞としても使用可. 植物という意味の緑は指さない)
Meaning-en: green (Note: It can be used both as a noun and adjective. As a noun, it's used for non-green plants)

Meaning-jp: 持っている、所有する、手に取る
心（事象として表現する場合）
Meaning-en: heart, mind (when presenting it as a phenomenon)

Meaning-jp: 無駄な、くだらない、徒労
Meaning-en: futile, useless, worthless, waste of effort

Meaning-jp: さあ、やあ、ねえ（呼びかけ語句） (呼びかけや感嘆。非常に軽く発音するとほとんど「や」にしか聴こえない)
Meaning-en: hey, you (to get someone's attention) (Note: Used both for admiration and calling. It can be pronounced as "hyear" or "ya", but generally, "ya" is the only way used because of being faster to pronounce)

Meaning-jp: 小鳥 (語源は「奏でる者」でhymmeから来ている。)
Meaning-en: small bird (Note: This word originally meant "music player", and it originated from "hymme").

Meaning-jp: 謳う、奏でる、共鳴する (名詞的使い方をする場合もある。その場合は、波動、波など、形のない振動を指す。)
Meaning-en: sing, play (a instrument), resonate (Note: It can be also used as a noun. In that case, it would mean "waves", "waving", and "vibration of formless things").

Meaning-jp: 波動、調べ、メロディ (hymmnosよりも軽い、意味的にも浅いもの。)
Meaning-en: sound waves, tune, melody (Note: Has lighter connotations than Hymmnos. It actually is used for talking about songs in a more superficial form).

Meaning-jp: 愛 (infel yor で「ありがとう」という意味に)
初期化する、清純化する

Meaning-en: inside (of the Soulspace), within one's heart

Meaning-jp: とらわれる、固執する、はまる

Meaning-en: calm down, return to one's self
late, be late, be too late

Meaning-jp: それこそ （強調する為の冠詞 母音の前）
Meaning-en: *that* (used to emphasize, in front of a vowel sound)
borne of laments, borne of grief

Meaning-jp: 奏でる (謳う（hymme）に近いが、こちらの方が更に比喩的に使われる。)
Meaning-en: play (instrument) (Note: It's very similar to the "singing" meaning of "hymme", but it's used in a much more figurative manner)

Meaning-jp: それこそ （強調する為の冠詞 子音の前）
Meaning-en: *that* (used to emphasize, in front of a consonant sound)

Meaning-jp: ～かもしれない、ひょっとすると、もしかしたら
星 (LYAをつけると意訳で「澪の御子」)
Meaning-en: star, planet (Note: if it has a "LYA" before it, the meaning changes to "Maiden of Mio")
Maoh, Rhaplanca's partner in Meta Falss mythology

Meaning-jp: 愛してる、大好きです (人生においてかけがえのない人にしか使わない。)
Meaning-en: love, very fond of (Note: Used to talk about the most irreplaceable person to the speaker)

Meaning-jp: 無垢な, 無垢な願い
記憶 (Aをつけると「夢（見る方）」に意訳する。)
Meaning-en: memory (Note: if it's preceeded by an "A" emotion vowel, then its meaning is changed to "dream")

Meaning-jp: 後退する、さがる、逃げ去る、立ち去る
諦める、挫ける、挫折する
入れる、召喚する (物理的ではない、魔法的な場合に使用する。)
Meaning-en: let in, summon (Note: It isn't used to refer to a physical phenomenon, rather, it's for situations were magic is being used)

Meaning-jp: 初めて、初めての (イニ（初期化）とノイ（１）に由来する)
問題、障害 (na orviclle:無問題=大丈夫)
Meaning-en: problem, question, obstacle (Note: na orviclle can mean "no problem" or "it's okay").
out from ~ (note: only used in Hymmnos Spells)

Meaning-jp: 襲い掛かる、降りかかる
～の（所有の助詞） (英語のofと同義（文脈によっては必ずしも必要ではない）
Meaning-en: of (possessive article) (Note: Equivalent to the English "of", though depending on context, it isn't always necessary)

Meaning-jp: 切り離す (魔法的な場合) (物理的ではない、魔法的な場合に使用する。)
Meaning-en: to cut loose (in the case of magic) (Note: It isn't used to refer to a physical phenomenon, rather, it's for situations were magic is being used)

Meaning-jp: 緑（植物） (植物を指して言う場合の『緑』)
Meaning-en: greenery (plants) (Note: Used only for talking about green plants)

Meaning-jp: 着る 身に着ける 身に纏う
～します様に、～どうか…して下さい
Meaning-en: may it be so, would you please do ~, please ~

Meaning-jp: 人々、人間 (Eをつけると意訳で「恋人、妻、旦那」 YEをつけると意訳で「家族、身内」 LYEをつけると「人類皆兄弟」的な意味になる。)
Meaning-en: people, humanity (Notes: Preceeded by an "E" emotion vowel, the meaning changes to "lover" and "wife/husband". Preceeded by an "YE" emotion vowel, the meaning changes to "family, relatives, friends". Preceeded by an "LYE" emotion vowel, the meaning changes to "the grand family of humankind".)

Meaning-jp: 大地を揺らすもの、(転じて)雷鳴、稲妻
Meaning-en: thing that shakes the earth, thunder, lightning

Meaning-jp: 沈黙 黙る 静寂
夢魔 悪夢 迷夢
(物、状態、状況を)与える 齎す
Meaning-en: to give a, to present a (thing, condition, state)

Meaning-jp: 返事をする、応答する、返事、応え
寝転ぶ 横たわる 横になる 横にする
空 (語呂の問題で、同じ単語が何度も頻出してしまうため、ファンタスマゴリアのためにシュレリアが紡いだワード。)
Meaning-en: sky (Note: Word crafted by Shurelia for Phantasmagoria, because of the problem that represented the use of "ciel" given its two meanings).

Meaning-jp: 荊の蔓、茨、棘 (棘を持つ植物)
Meaning-en: thorny vine, thorn, thorny shrub (Note: Used only for plants that have thorns)

Meaning-jp: 光 (LYAをつけると意訳で「焔の御子」)
Meaning-en: light (Note: if it's preceeded by a "LYA" emotion vowel, its meaning changes to "Maiden of Homura")

Meaning-jp: 眠らせる、(活動を)停止させる

Meaning-en: in such a way, so much

Meaning-jp: （日の光が）輝く、燦々と照りつける (ただし、sol cielという熟語でこの世界「ソル・シエール」を指す。ただし標準律では世界を指すときに「ar ciel」といい、「sol ciel」とは言わない。この世界をsol cielと言うのはあくまで古メタファルス律のみ。)
Meaning-en: (daylight) shines, shine down brilliantly (Note: However, the phrase "Sol Ciel" refers to the region of the first Ar tonelico tower, and was to be used as the name of the world. It's because there was already a phrase in Central Standard Note for this world, "Ar Ciel", that "Sol Ciel" ended becoming only the name of the region of the first tower. That region owes its name to the Ancient Metafalss Note.)
for, because of, for the sake of

Meaning-jp: 魔術、魔力 (mayaという魔法を現すヒュムノス語もありますが、そちらよりも、より呪文に特化したイメージです。(mayaは神秘的なニュアンスを含んだ言葉。maya=ミラクル。sosar=ソーサリー…みたいな位置づけ。)
Meaning-en: magic, magical power (Note: Even if the magic that manifests through Hymmnos is called "maya", actually the spells have a much more specialized image. "maya" has a nuance of miracles made by the power of the gods, while sosar... its more similar to standard sorcery).

Meaning-jp: 取る、奪う、盗む (強引に取る場合。負の行動としての取る。)
Meaning-en: take, steal, snatch away (Note: Used when one takes something from other person by force. Used usually by the one that lost the stolen thing)

Meaning-jp: 取り合う、奪い合う (強引に取り合う場合。負の行動としての取る。)
Meaning-en: compete, struggle for (Note: Used for fierce battles or competitions. Used usually by the loser.)

Meaning-jp: 深淵、深いところ (物理的ではない、主に「心」やメンタル、精神世界の表現語として使う。)
Meaning-en: abyss, depths (Note: Not used to refer to a physical abyss, but rather to a mental one. This word is usually used to represent the Soulspace).

Meaning-jp: 展開する、咲かせる、実現する
留まる、残る、居る、居座る (英語のstayと同義)
Meaning-en: halt, remain, exist, stay (Note: Equivalent to the English "stay")

Meaning-jp: 操る、操作する、意のままにする
Meaning-en: control, operate, do as one pleases

Meaning-jp: ～に対して（対象を特定・指定する）

Meaning-en: good will, innate goodness of man

Meaning-jp: 心に希望を秘める 望む（第Ⅱ想音）
Meaning-en: wishful, hiding wishes in my heart

Meaning-jp: (見えなかったものが)顕れる、体現(する)、具現化(する)

Meaning-en: at ~, to ~ (Note: Equivalent to the English "to")

Meaning-jp: 体感する、実感する。経験する
無垢の、穢れなき、清らかな、美しい
酒・果実酒・葡萄酒 (酒精の代名詞)
Meaning-en: alcohol, liquor, wine (Note: general pronoun for alcoholic beverages)
aim at, have an eye on

Meaning-jp: どちらでもない 今、有るがままの状況を受け入れる（第Ⅲ想音）
Meaning-en: it doesn't matter - I will accept things the way they are now

Meaning-jp: 人魚 (第一紀に海に住んでいた神)
Meaning-en: mermaid, merman (Note: A god/dess that used to live in the oceans during the First Era)
wish, desire, pray, request for, hope for

Meaning-jp: ～の中に、中で（状態を表す助詞） (英語のinと同義（文脈によっては必ずしも必要ではない）)
Meaning-en: inside of ~, in ~ (particle to indicate current condition) (Note: Equivalent to the English "in", though it's not always necessary, depending on the context)

Meaning-jp: ～の上（表面）に（状態を表す助詞） (英語のonと同義)
Meaning-en: above (on the surface) of ~ (particle to indicate current condition) (Note: Equivalent to the English "on")

Meaning-jp: 給え (より塔に尊敬の感情を明確に伝えたい場合に使用する。 例：xe khal(護り給え) あまり常用される単語ではない。)
Meaning-en: please (used before a verb), bestow, grant, receive (Note: Used when someone wants to state a feeling of great respect for the tower. Example: xe khal (please, protect me) It's not a daily used word)

Meaning-jp: リラックスする、安らぐ
進む、進行 (騎士隊のように、大勢で行軍するときに用いる。勇敢な様。)
Meaning-en: advance, improve (Note: Used for the marching of a great number of people, such as knight company. Has heroic connotations).

Meaning-jp: 決意を心に秘める 真摯（第Ⅱ想音）
Meaning-en: hiding determination in the heart, sincerity, earnestness
